references.reason: This paper is foundational to the concept of prompting large language models, which is central to Prompt Depth Anything's methodology.

references.paper_title: Zip-nerf: Anti-aliased grid-based neural radiance fields
references.reason: The Zip-NeRF model is used in the paper's data pipeline to generate high-quality pseudo ground truth depth from real-world data.

references.paper_title: Arkitscenes: A diverse real-world dataset for 3d indoor scene understanding using mobile rgb-d data
references.reason: ARKitScenes is one of the primary datasets used for evaluating the performance of Prompt Depth Anything, demonstrating its practical application.

references.paper_title: Zoedepth: Zero-shot transfer by combining relative and metric depth
references.reason: ZoeDepth is a key comparative method in the paper, highlighting the advancement of Prompt Depth Anything in metric depth estimation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper provides background on diffusion models, which are related to the depth foundation models used in Prompt Depth Anything.
